tasks.task: Setting up a drip irrigation system for a garden.
subtasks: Locating and identifying components of the drip irrigation system.
Connecting the system to a water hose faucet.
Installing a battery timer to control watering.
Adapting the system for different garden types (vegetable garden, raised beds, containers).

tasks.task: MAINTASK: Setting up a drip irrigation system for a garden.
